me.title: Who am I ?
me.description-1: Austin-William Lo, 3rd year student at Epitech to become an Information Technology Expert after a BAC +5.
me.description-2: I learned various programming languages ​​such as C, C ++, Python, Flutter (Dart) or JavaScript through Haskell through small and large projects in order to be ready to work in a business. Whether for personal or professional projects, I learned to be autonomous, to work in a team and to adapt to any situation.
me.description-3: I would like to work in a professional context during an internship and I am at your disposal for any questions.

hobbies.title: What I do during my free time
hobbies.hobby-5: Get out in the fresh air because it's important to get some fresh air to feel good

footer.title: Do you want to know more about me ?
footer.description: Contact me for more information with LinkedIn, Github, or by email.
